main event: On 18 July 1965, witnesses in the Pittsburgh area observed two bright lights moving in varied directions over a period of 10 minutes.
interesting points: The lights were reported to be moving up and down and side to side., Witnesses described the objects as faster than shooting stars., A significant number of additional reports from residents were received during the week following the sighting., Various shapes including triangular, diamond, and cigar-shaped objects were described in the subsequent reports., Observations were considered astronomical in nature by the inspecting officer.
sighted object: two bright lights in the sky
